name: Grizzard Communications Group
overview: Grizzard Communications Group, Inc. provides direct response marketing and fundraising services for nonprofit organizations in North America. It offers brand-strategy development, multi-channel creative, integrated media programs, digital strategies, planned giving, research and analysis, marketing technologies, database management, production of direct mail pieces, and results analysis. The company also provides call-center, strategic-list management, media buying, and fulfillment services. It also serves rescue missions, food banks, and various animal welfare and humane societies. Grizzard Communications Group, Inc. was founded in 1919 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia. The company has additional offices in Houston, New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Stamford, and Lincoln. As of July 18, 2001, Grizzard Communications Group, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Omnicom Group Inc.
